entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
